A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted a new story (as opposed to a rehash) and they DEFINITELY delivered in this area.  I don't need a movie to be perfect (and this movie was not perfect) but I was very much a fan.  There were scenes that were shocking\, and scenes that were visually arresting.  It is a great addition to the ever-growing Star Wars collection of movies.  I will definitely be seeing this in the theaters again soon so I can start to digest things more completely.  :)
